newsitem.title: USA: West Marine Dec same store sales rise.
newsitem.headline: West Marine Dec same store sales rise.

text.p: West Marine Inc said Thurdsay that net sales in December 1996 were $29.9 million, an increase of 49.4 percent from net sales of $20.0 million for the same period a year ago.
Comparable store net sales for the five week period ended Dec. 28, 1996 increased 2.2 percent from the same period a year ago.
Sales for December 1996 were hurt by the closing of stores for the Thanksgiving Holiday, which occurred during fiscal December in 1996 but was in fiscal November in 1995.

Comparable store net sales for the latest 13 weeks increased 4.4 percent compared with the same period a year ago. Net sales for the latest 13 weeks were $69.3 million, an increase of 52.0 percent from sales of $45.6 million for the 13 week period a year ago.

Comparable store net sales for the latest 52 weeks increased 5.4 percent compared with the same period a year ago. Net sales for the latest 52 weeks were $323.3 million, an increase of 44.2 percent from sales of $224.2 million for the 52 week period a year ago.
West Marine acquired E&B Marine on June 17, 1996. Accordingly, net sales include the sales of E&B Marine.
